member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Bots.BotHazard.GetBestEvadeDirection(System.Double)
member.summary:
Returns the largest approximate gap to escape.
This gap is approximated by finding the gaps between all potential collideable objects around the Podbot, and weighting them positively by size and weighting them inversely by both distance and gapsize. The direction bisecting the largest of these weighted gaps is returned.
member.param: The distance defining how far the bot can see.

member.summary: The configuration for generating orders and inventory using a poisson process.

member.summary: Parameter-less constructor mainly used by the xml-serializer.

member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.#ctor(RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DefaultConstructorIdentificationClass)
member.summary: Constructor that generates default values for all fields.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.PoissonMode
member.summary: The mode of the poisson generator if used.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.InitialOrderCount
member.summary: The initial number of orders ready to be allocated.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.InitialBundleCount
member.summary: The initial number of bundles ready to be allocated.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.DistortOrderRateParameter
member.summary: Can be used to set the type of information used to distort the rate parameter during simulation execution.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.DistortBundleRateParameter
member.summary: Can be used to set the type of information used to distort the rate parameter during simulation execution.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.AverageOrdersPerHourAndStation
member.summary: The number of orders generated in one hour per station that the poisson process is aiming for. This number will be used to calculate an instance-wide rate in all poisson modes.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.AverageBundlesPerHourAndStation
member.summary: The number of bundles generated in one hour per station that the poisson process is aiming for. This number will be used to calculate an instance-wide rate in all poisson modes.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.AverageOrdersPerHourAndStationHigh
member.summary: The number of orders generated in one hour per station that the poisson process is aiming for. This number will be used to calculate an instance-wide rate in for the high-low mode in high times.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.AverageBundlesPerHourAndStationHigh
member.summary: The number of bundles generated in one hour per station that the poisson process is aiming for. This number will be used to calculate an instance-wide rate in for the high-low mode in high times.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.LowToHighSwitchesPerHour
member.summary: The number of switches in average to go from low to high in one hour. This is used to determine the rate parameter, but seems more intuitive than immediately specifying the rate. In contrast to this description the rate of course immediately changes to the one to go from high to low, hence, no multiple events will be generated using this parameter but only the first one.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.HighToLowSwitchesPerHour
member.summary: The number of switches in average to go from high to low in one hour. This is used to determine the rate parameter, but seems more intuitive than immediately specifying the rate. In contrast to this description the rate of course immediately changes to the one to go from low to high, hence, no multiple events will be generated using this parameter but only the first one.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.BundleGenAffectedByHighPeriod
member.summary: Indicates whether the generation of bundles is affected during the high period, i.e. more bundles are generated during the high period.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.OrderGenAffectedByHighPeriod
member.summary: Indicates whether the generation of orders is affected during the high period, i.e. more orders are generated during the high period.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.MaxTimeForTimeDependentOrderRates
member.summary: The time after which the rate value of the poisson process for orders loops (in inhomogeneous poisson mode).

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.MaxTimeForTimeDependentBundleRates
member.summary: The time after which the rate value of the poisson process for bundles loops (in inhomogeneous poisson mode).

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.TimeDependentOrderWeights
member.summary: The weights of the rates for the orders depending on the current time. One element specifies the weight of a rate as a value and the time in seconds (starting at 0). The rate weight then is used starting from the time given as the key until another KVP specifies a new rate weight.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PoissonInventoryConfiguration.TimeDependentBundleWeights
member.summary: The weights of the rates for the bundles depending on the current time. One element specifies the weight of a rate as a value and the time in seconds (starting at 0). The rate weight then is used starting from the time given as the key until another KVP specifies a new rate weight.

member.summary: The inventory level threshold after dropping below which bundle generation will be activated again.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandInventoryConfiguration.InventoryLevelDrivenOrderGeneration
member.summary: Indicates whether inventory level is tracked and order generation is paused as soon as inventory drops below a certain threshold.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandInventoryConfiguration.InventoryLevelOrderStopThreshold
member.summary: The inventory level threshold after dropping below which order generation will get deactivated.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandInventoryConfiguration.InventoryLevelOrderRestartThreshold
member.summary: The inventory level threshold after exceeding which order generation will get activated again.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandInventoryConfiguration.DownPeriodConfiguration
member.summary: A sub configuration specifying down periods for order and bundle generation.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration
member.summary: A sub configuration specifying down periods for order and bundle generation.

member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Parameter-less constructor mainly used by the xml-serializer.

member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.#ctor(RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DefaultConstructorIdentificationClass)
member.summary: Constructor that generates default values for all fields.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.MaxTimeForOrderDownAndUpPeriods
member.summary: The time after which the timepoints for order down periods loop.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.MaxTimeForBundleDownAndUpPeriods
member.summary: The time after which the timepoints for bundle down periods loop.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.OrderDownAndUpTimes
member.summary: The timepoints at which order generation is paused or reactivated again. true indicates a starting down period, false a starting normal period. These have to be ordered by their timestamp. If no element with timepoint 0 is given, it is assumed that generation is activated at the begin of the period.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DemandDownPeriodConfiguration.BundleDownAndUpTimes
member.summary: The timepoints at which bundle generation is paused or reactivated again. true indicates a starting down period, false a starting normal period. These have to be ordered by their timestamp. If no element with timepoint 0 is given, it is assumed that generation is activated at the begin of the period.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration
member.summary: The configuration for submitting big batches of orders or bundles at specific timepoints.

member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Parameter-less constructor mainly used by the xml-serializer.

member.name: M:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.#ctor(RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.DefaultConstructorIdentificationClass)
member.summary: Constructor that generates default values for all fields.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.MaxTimeForOrderSubmissions
member.summary: The time after which the timepoints for order batch submissions loop.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.MaxTimeForBundleSubmissions
member.summary: The time after which the timepoints for bundle batch submissions loop.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.OrderBatches
member.summary: The timepoints at which orders shall be submitted as a batch and also the number of orders to have in backlog per station after submitting the batch. These have to be ordered by their timestamp. Orders will be generated until the respective number of orders is available in the backlog times the station count of the instance.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.BatchInventoryConfiguration.BundleBatches
member.summary: The timepoints at which bundles shall be submitted as a batch and also the aimed for inventory level after submitting the batch. These have to be ordered by their timestamp. Bundles will be generated until there are enough bundles in backlog and the system as well such that the respective inventory level is reached.

member.summary: The name of this generator config.

member.summary: Some description of the file.

member.summary: The default weight to use when no weight is present for the given item.

member.summary: The default weight to use when no weight is present for the given combination of items.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.SimpleItemGeneratorConfiguration.ProbToUseCoWeight
member.summary: The probability of using a co-weight for generating the next item instead of just generating a non-related item based on the single item probabilities.

member.summary: All item descriptions that can be generated with this configuration with their respective ID and hue.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.SimpleItemGeneratorConfiguration.ItemDescriptionWeights
member.summary: Specifies for each item description how much space is consumed by one unit of it.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.SimpleItemGeneratorConfiguration.ItemDescriptionBundleSizes
member.summary: Specifies for each item description the size of a bundle when replenishing it.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.SimpleItemGeneratorConfiguration.ItemWeights
member.summary: The weights of the items. These will be transformed into probabilities to use in order to generate new item-bundles and also the first item of an order.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.SimpleItemGeneratorConfiguration.ItemCoWeights
member.summary: The weights of the item combinations. These will be transformed into probabilities and used when one item was generated for an order, but another one shall be generated. A higher weight results in a higher probability that the given item is generated next for the current order.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented path planning strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.Simple
member.summary: The default path planning algorithm utilizing an A* implementation.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.Dummy
member.summary: Dummy Random Hop

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.WHCAvStar
member.summary: Silver 06 - Cooperative pathfinding

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.WHCAnStar
member.summary: Silver 06 - Cooperative pathfinding

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.FAR
member.summary: Wang - Fast and Memory-Efficient Multi-Agent Pathfinding

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.BCP
member.summary: Geramifard - Biased Cost Pathnding

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.OD_ID
member.summary: Standley - Finding Optimal Solutions to Cooperative Pathnding Problems

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.CBS
member.summary: Sharon - Conflict-based search for optimal multi-agent pathfinding

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PathPlanningMethodType.PAS
member.summary: Erdmann - Parallel Multi-Agent Pathfinding

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented task allocation strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.BruteForce
member.summary: A method aiming to choose the task with the least execution time from all available tasks.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.Random
member.summary: A mainly random approach to the task allocation.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.Balanced
member.summary: A method aiming to distribute bots evenly among the stations and only allocate tasks fitting their currently assigned station.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.Swarm
member.summary: A swarm intelligence inspired task allocation using stygmergic values to distribute bots among the stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.ConstantRatio
member.summary: A method keeping the ratios between robots assigned for picking and for replenishment fixed and also does not change the equal distribution of them across the stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.TaskAllocationMethodType.Concept
member.summary: A new method that has no concept yet.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.StationActivationMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented station activation strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.StationActivationMethodType.ActivateAll
member.summary: A method simply keeping all stations activated.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.StationActivationMethodType.BacklogThreshold
member.summary: A method activating and deactivating stations depending on the current backlog size.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.StationActivationMethodType.ConstantRatio
member.summary: A method activating pick and replenishment stations in a constant ratio to each other.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.StationActivationMethodType.WorkShift
member.summary: A method that emulates working shifts and activates / deactivates stations accordingly.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented item storage strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Dummy
member.summary: A dummy approach that does nothing at all. (Used in case another manager integrates this problem)

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Random
member.summary: A mainly random approach to the item storage problem.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Location
member.summary: A approach to the item storage problem with multiple different sized locations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Correlative
member.summary: An approach that aims to allocate items to pods to which highly correlating items are already assigned.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Fixed
member.summary: An approach that aims to allocate items to pods to which highly correlating items are already assigned.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Turnover
member.summary: An approach that aims to build high-speed and low-speed pods.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.ClosestLocation
member.summary: An approach that aims to allocate items to pods with smallest distance.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Reactive
member.summary: An approach that waits for the allocation of bundles to input-stations and then applies a metric to allocate them to pods.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.Emptiest
member.summary: An approach that aims to allocate items to the emptiest pods.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ItemStorageMethodType.LeastDemand
member.summary: An approach that aims to allocate items to the least demanded pods.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented pod storage strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Dummy
member.summary: A dummy approach that does nothing at all. (Used in case another manager integrates this problem)

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Fixed
member.summary: This method locks the positions at which the pods are stored.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Nearest
member.summary: This method uses only distance information to determine the position of the pod to store.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.StationBased
member.summary: This method aims to store pods near to the stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Cache
member.summary: This method aims to keep pods needed in near future near the station, while bringing others back to the remaining inventory.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Utility
member.summary: This method determines scores for the pods and matches them with scores for the storage locations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Random
member.summary: This method allocates a random storage position to the pod.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodStorageMethodType.Turnover
member.summary: This method uses item-frequency information to assign the pods to the positions.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented repositioning strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType.Dummy
member.summary: A dummy approach that does not supply any repositioning moves. Pods will exclusively be positioned by the pod storage manager.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType.Cache
member.summary: A method aiming to store useful pods in a cache zone while freeing up space in front of the output-stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType.CacheDropoff
member.summary: A method aiming to store useful pods in a cache zone while freeing up space in front of the output-stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType.Utility
member.summary: A method that repositions pods which utility value is most out of sync with what the current value suggested by a pod utility manager component says.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.RepositioningMethodType.Concept
member.summary: A concept repositioning method.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented order batching strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Default
member.summary: Default random order to output station assignments.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Random
member.summary: A complete random assignment of orders to output-stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Workload
member.summary: An approach assigning orders based on the current workload of the stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Related
member.summary: An approach assigning orders to stations whose orders have the most lines in common.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.NearBestPod
member.summary: An approach assigning orders to stations near the best pod for the order.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.PodMatching
member.summary: An approach selecting an order for a station where there is the best match of inbound items.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.LinesInCommon
member.summary: An approach selecting an order that is most similar to the ones already assigned to a station.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Queue
member.summary: An approach building queues per station and selecting orders from these.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.OrderBatchingMethodType.Foresight
member.summary: An approach exploiting information about the backlog to increase similarities of orders at the stations.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ReplenishmentBatchingMethodType
member.summary: All types of implemented replenishment batching strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ReplenishmentBatchingMethodType.Random
member.summary: A complete random assignment of bundles to input-stations.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.ReplenishmentBatchingMethodType.SamePod
member.summary: Bundles for the same pod are assigned to the same input-station.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.MethodManagementType
member.summary: All types of implemented meta manager strategies.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.MethodManagementType.NoChange
member.summary: Does not change any of the previously set mechanisms.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.MethodManagementType.Random
member.summary: Does change managers periodically to new random ones.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.MethodManagementType.Scheduled
member.summary: Does change managers at predefined timepoints to predefined ones.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.FixedItemStorageConfiguration.ClassBorders
member.summary: Defines the class borders that specify the relative amount of storage locations per class. The first border specifies the high frequency section, the next one the next high frequency section and so on. The last border will always be 1.0, because we want to use all our storage locations. As one example: "0.1,0.3,1.0" will lead to 3 classes that contain 10 % of the pods in the first class, 20 % in the second one and the rest in the last class.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.FixedItemStorageConfiguration.ReallocationDelay
member.summary: The time between two subsequent runs of the re-allocation of item-descriptions and pods to the storage classes.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.FixedItemStorageConfiguration.ReallocationOrderCount
member.summary: The number of orders between two subsequent runs of the re-allocation of item-descriptions and pods to the storage classes.

member.summary: Indicates whether the emptiest pod is filled or a random one.

member.summary: Specifies the threshold of the reserved capacity above which the pods are refilled.

member.summary: The type of the method.

member.summary: Indicates the base metric to calculate the score value.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.OnlyPositiveLateness
member.summary: Indicates whether lateness will only be considered as a positive value, i.e. only already late orders will make a difference in the score value.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.PreferSameTier
member.summary: Indicates whether to prefer the same tier.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.BacklogWeight
member.summary: The weight of picks that can potentially be done with the content of the pod for orders currently assigned to the station's individual backlog. The number expresses how one pick will be weighted compared to a pick that can be done right away with orders already assigned to the station.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.CompleteableOrderBoost
member.summary: The additional boost for picks that are part of an order that can be completed with the assignment, i.e. a value of one means that completeable orders count double.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.CompleteableQueuedOrders
member.summary: Indicates whether completeable orders that are queued will also be considered.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.TimeCosts
member.summary: Indicates how much one time unit (for fetching the pod and bringing it to the station) costs in terms of picks (or in terms of eliminated age). I.e., this measure is a penalty cost added to each assignment option. Hence, assignments that use a pod further away get punished.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.EstimateBotPodDistancePenalty
member.summary: Indicates whether to only estimate the distance between bot and pod in order to calculate a penalty (instead of computing the real paths with A*, computationally costly).

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PCScorerPodForOStationBotWorkAmount.EstimatePodStationDistancePenalty
member.summary: Indicates whether to only estimate the distance between pod and station in order to calculate a penalty (instead of computing the real paths with A*, computationally costly).

member.summary: Distinguishes different modes for the selection of pods for picking.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodSelectionExtractRequestFilteringMode.AssignedOnly
member.summary: Only requests already assigned to a station will be considered.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodSelectionExtractRequestFilteringMode.AssignedAndQueuedEqually
member.summary: Assigned and queued requests will be considered equally.

member.name: F:RAWSimO.Core.Configurations.PodSelectionExtractRequestFilteringMode.AssignedAndCompleteQueued
member.summary: Assigned requests and requests belonging to immediately completeable orders will be considered.

member.summary: Allocates an available store task to the bot for the predefined input-station. If no task is available the search might be extended to neighbour-stations or a rest task is done.
member.param: The bot to allocate a task to.
The station to do work for.
Indicates whether the search can be extended to neighbor stations.
The radius by which the search can be expanded.
member.returns: true if bot has a new store task or is just parking the pod, false if it is doing a rest task.

members.member:
Allocates an available extract task to the bot for the predefined output-station. If no task is available the search might be extended to neighbour-stations or a rest task is done.
The bot to allocate a task to. The station to do work for. Indicates whether the search can be extended to neighbor stations. The radius by which the search can be expanded. Pod selection config to use. /// true if bot has a new extract task or is just parking the pod, false if it is doing a rest task.

member.name: T:RAWSimO.Core.Control.Defaults.TaskAllocation.BruteForceBotManager
member.summary:
A brute-force manager deciding the next task for each bot by checking all possible tasks for the one with the minimal time for storing the current pod, picking up the next one and bringing it to the task's destination station.
This manager overrides any storage assignment or pod storage assignment manager.

member.param: The bot to get a task for.

THIS PARTIAL CLASS CONTAINS THE CORE FIELDS OF AN INSTANCE
The core element of each simulation instance.
THIS PARTIAL CLASS CONTAINS ALL METHODS AND ADDITIONAL FIELDS FOR CREATION OF NEW ELEMENTS OF THE INSTANCE
The core element of each simulation instance.
THIS PARTIAL CLASS CONTAINS NOTIFIERS AND EVENTS USED TO INVOKE CALLBACKS IN ORDER TO UPDATE OBSERVERS
The core element of each simulation instance.
THIS PARTIAL CLASS CONTAINS ADDITIONAL FIELDS AND META-INFORMATION
The core element of each simulation instance.
THIS PARTIAL CLASS CONTAINS ALL CORE ELEMENTS OF THE PERFORMANCE INDICATORS
The core element of each simulation instance.

member.summary: This factor can be used to further penalize turning, i.e. further slowing down the turn speed. This is useful, because acceleration and deceleration are not respected by this manager. However, turning does cause acceleration and deceration, which takes even more time than turning itself.
